Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Joe Biden does not support the Green New Deal, as stated in the presidential debate.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Joe Biden supports the Green New Deal, as it only references his climate plan that shares some goals with the Green New Deal.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Joe Biden supports the Green New Deal based on his climate plan, despite his explicit denial during the debate.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Joe Biden used the Green New Deal as a framework to build his own plan, which differs from the original Green New Deal.
